::KitKat::

She saw Zava go down.  She raised her rifle and aimed at Zava's 
head.  She held her breath and fire a carefully aimed shot.


-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Zava
> 
> Zava dodged the shots from Terrorsaur, and than the ones from 
KitKat, 
> but the shots by Drillbit were an entire surprise. All  of them hit 
> her around the lower chest. She fell to the ground with mech fluid 
> poured out of her chest. She walked for a few steps, trying to get 
to 
> Deemos, but fell down in pain. She used the comm as her last resort.
> 
> "Deemos.....This is Zava....I..I'm closer to the Pred cave
(cough)... 
> Hurt...badly. Please...help me."
> 
> She gives up and goes into stasis lock.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Gotron
> 
> Gotron followed behind Burning Hammer
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream
> 
> As Starscream got nearer to Testifyer, he fired off two missles.
